name: Deep Space Outlaw (Midgento)
description:
This is our project for Games Development at University of Plymouth (2nd year). This game is currently polished to an acceptable state right now, but we will be working on this project over summer to add some more elements that we really want to implement. 

Deep Space Outlaw

This is a rogue-lite genre game set in the midst's of space where the objective is to survive and collect items that can be equipped to power up the ship. Asteroids are definitely your enemy as colliding with them is devastating!

All ship components are randomised, so each individual play-through will be a unique experience.

Dark Souls inspired death where you will respawn with no items, and a quest pointer will activate to guide you back to your items.

Controls:

W,A,S,D for movement of the ship

Left-Click for shooting a weapon (if you have one equipped)

Hold down space to deploy an anchor for some kick-a** J-turns and doughnuts

i opens up  and closes the inventory which will pause time, allowing you to navigate your inventory with ease

Left-Click on any slot in the inventory to equip/unequip items and components

-- Our Development Team --

Athanasios Sgouros - Sound Engineer

William Coxon - Code Engineer // Artist

Michael Riley - Code Engineer

Jordan Wilson - Code Engineer // Level Designer

Liam Thomas -  QA Tester
